meanings.meaning_en_US: A young human being below the age of puberty.

examples.sentence: Every [child] deserves a loving family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個孩子都值得擁有一個充滿愛的家庭

examples.sentence: The park was filled with [children].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公園裡充滿了孩子

examples.sentence: She wants to become a [child] psychologist.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想成為一名兒童心理學家

meanings.meaning_en_US: A son or daughter of any age.

examples.sentence: She is the only [child] in the family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是家裡唯一的子女

examples.sentence: They raised their [children] with care.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們細心地養活他們的子女

examples.sentence: A [child] can also refer to a descendant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 子女也可以指後代

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tool used for removing marks made by pencils.

examples.sentence: I used an [eraser] to fix my mistakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我用橡皮擦修改我的錯誤。

examples.sentence: This [eraser] is very effective.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個橡皮擦非常有效。

examples.sentence: Don’t forget to bring an [eraser] for the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 考試時不要忘記帶橡皮擦。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.

examples.sentence: She felt [happy] when she received the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當她收到消息時，她感到快樂。

examples.sentence: A [happy] child is always a joy to be around.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 快樂的孩子總是讓人愉快。

examples.sentence: They shared [happy] moments together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們共同分享快樂的時光。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Easy to perceive, understand, or interpret.

examples.sentence: The instructions were very [clear].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些指示非常清晰。

examples.sentence: She had a [clear] understanding of the topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這個主題有清晰的理解。

examples.sentence: The sky was [clear] after the storm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 暴風雨過後，天空變得清澈。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To remove impurities or unwanted elements.

examples.sentence: Please [clear] your desk before leaving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在離開前清理你的書桌。

examples.sentence: We need to [clear] the path for the emergency vehicles.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要清理道路以便緊急車輛通行。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [clear] your browsing history.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一定要清除你的瀏覽歷史。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A separate seat for one person, typically with a back and four legs.

examples.sentence: She sat down on the [chair] to relax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她坐在椅子上放鬆。

examples.sentence: Can you bring me a [chair] from the dining room?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能從餐廳給我拿一把椅子嗎？

examples.sentence: The [chair] is too low for the desk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這把椅子對於桌子太矮了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device or implement used to carry out a particular function.

examples.sentence: He used a [tool] to fix the car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用[工具]修理汽車。

examples.sentence: A hammer is a common [tool].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 錘子是常見的[工具]。

examples.sentence: You need the right [tool] for this job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要合適的[工具]來做這項工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A facility that provides medical treatment and care to sick or injured individuals.

examples.sentence: She was taken to the [hospital] after the accident.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 事故後她被送往醫院。

examples.sentence: The [hospital] is located in the city center.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫院位於市中心。

examples.sentence: He works as a doctor in a local [hospital].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在當地的醫院工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To divide or sever something using a sharp tool.

examples.sentence: Be careful not to [cut] yourself with that knife.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小心不要被那把刀切到自己。

examples.sentence: She decided to [cut] the paper into smaller pieces.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定把紙剪成小片。

examples.sentence: He can [cut] the vegetables very quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他可以非常快地切菜。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or entity that belongs to a group or organization.

examples.sentence: He is a proud [member] of the team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是這個團隊的自豪成員。

examples.sentence: The club welcomes every new [member].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 俱樂部歡迎每位新成員。

examples.sentence: Being a [member] has its benefits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 成為成員有其好處。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Feeling sad because one has no friends or company.

examples.sentence: She felt very [lonely] in the new city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在新城市裡感到非常孤獨

examples.sentence: A [lonely] night can be difficult.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孤獨的夜晚可能很難熬

examples.sentence: He wrote songs about his [lonely] experiences.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他寫了關於他孤獨經歷的歌曲

meanings.meaning_en_US: Difficulty or problems that cause distress.

examples.sentence: She got into [trouble] with her parents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她跟父母之間有了麻煩

examples.sentence: The project is facing many [troubles].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目面臨許多麻煩

examples.sentence: He was always in [trouble] for being late.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他總因遲到而惹麻煩

meanings.meaning_en_US: An unspecified person.

examples.sentence: Someone left their bag here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 某人把他們的包留在這裡。

examples.sentence: Do you know someone who can help?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道某個可以幫忙的人嗎？

examples.sentence: Someone is knocking at the door.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有人在敲門。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey; not salty, sour, or bitter.

examples.sentence: The cake was so [sweet] that I could only eat a little.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那蛋糕太甜了，我只能吃一點。

examples.sentence: She has a [sweet] smile that brightens the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有一個甜美的微笑，可以照亮整個房間。

examples.sentence: I prefer [sweet] fruits like strawberries and mangoes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我偏愛像草莓和芒果這樣的甜水果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number following eighteen.

examples.sentence: She is [nineteen] years old.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她十九歲。

examples.sentence: Nineteen comes after eighteen in counting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 十九在計數中跟在十八之後。

examples.sentence: [Nineteen] is my favorite number.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 十九是我最喜歡的數字。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The quality of being hot; high temperature.

examples.sentence: The [heat] from the sun was intense.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽的熱量很強烈。

examples.sentence: He used a blanket to retain the [heat].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用毛毯來保持暖和。

examples.sentence: Excessive [heat] can cause dehydration.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 過多的熱量可能會導致脫水。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A shaped covering for the head, typically made of cloth or felt.

examples.sentence: He wore a red [hat] on his head.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他戴著一頂紅色的[帽子]。

examples.sentence: She bought a stylish [hat] from the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從商店裡買了一頂時尚的[帽子]。

examples.sentence: The cowboy [hat] is very popular.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牛仔[帽子]非常受歡迎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To or at a distance from a particular place.

examples.sentence: He moved [away] to start a new life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他搬走了以開始新生活。

examples.sentence: Don't stray too [away] from the path.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要離小路太遠。

examples.sentence: She is living [away] from home for the first time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她第一次離家生活。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Any of the twelve periods into which a year is divided.

examples.sentence: The project will take several [months] to complete.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該專案需要幾個月份才能完成。

examples.sentence: There are twelve [months] in a year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一年有十二個月份。

examples.sentence: The winter [months] can be very cold.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冬季的月份可能非常寒冷。
